verbose_text: While this may appear contradictory, IL-1RI -/- mice also showed the normal appearance of LPS induced sickness and weight loss (equivalent at 24 h post LPS in WT and IL-1R1 -/- mice : 3.22 g vs 2.96 g) and this is consistent with previous data showing that IL-1R1 -/- mice display the full spectrum of innate immune responses to LPS.
